comments:
After creating a JPA project, we are unable to build a model due to what looks like a new JDT issue.  This result in a loss of all Dali functionality.

The following exceptions is encountered.  We are only one component that causes this exceptions.  The JDT UI and the JDT Core also hit the same error when opening a Java class file.  The presence of annotations may or may not be related, but they don't appear to be related.
